about.info: Your website will be cross-browser, adaptive, valid, semantic, accessible and optimized!

alexey-mozgunov.name: Alexey Mozgunov
alexey-mozgunov.text: Thanks to nikkeyl for the prompt creation of the site. The task was completed within the agreed time frame. The site turned out to be light and high-quality according to modern trends and requirements, which is important for it's SEO promotion.
